name: Bloodberry Fields
description:
Bloodyberry Fields is a game about a young farmer named "hagane" who fights the demonic creature with her scythe and the power of the druids. In this game you need to be a good fighter and also a good tactician to manage your field!

PROTECT YOUR FARM!

  • Move around with WASD or Arrows
  • You lose if your farm is destroyed by enemies
  • Kill the enemies before they reach your farm (click on them when close enough)
  • You win if all waves have passed

HARVEST ORGANS FROM YOUR ENEMIES!

  • Click and hold on a corpse to harvest resources
  • Different enemies loot different resources

BUILD YOUR FIELD!

  • You can build towers from the harvested resources
  • You have to water them by clicking on them during farm mode (in between waves)
